lines.text: Wait a minute! You can't just walk into my life, hand me a package, tell me to give it to the man in the red hat, tell me you love me, and then walk out again!
Philip do NOT hit your brother in the head with trash!
Oh my gosh!
I'm going to take a look at his apartment.
Ok.
You grab a cab. Get on back to the Agency. You take my computer key card and start tracking down who owns this building. Leases, parent companies...
You know this is what always happens. I always have to go back to the agency.
We have to divide the workload Amanda.
I agree with you let's divide the workload. You follow the paper trail and I'll follow Zorbel.
Do you think you can break into Zorbel's place?
No.
Well?
Call me a cab.
You're a cab.
Oh Lee, are you alright?
Do I look alright? I'm chained to a pipe!
Once on the lips, forever on the hips
Do you mean someone slipped him a Huck Finn?
I think that's Mickey Finn.
I knew that.
You're not the one they're going to ship to Russia in a refrigerator!
No, I'm the one they're going to put up against the wall and shoot!
